articles.title: Risk factors for faster aging in the brain revealed in new study - Medical Xpress
articles.description: In a new study published in Nature Communications, researchers investigated the genetic and modifiable influences on fragile brain regions by looking at the brain scans of 40,000 UK Biobank participants aged over 45.
